page.title: 05A DAY'S NEWS,FARNBOROUGH
page.content:
{ { Planning permission is likely to be given for an 82 acre leisure haven in Cove on a site near the new{Southwood} developement.
************* Renewed efforts are being made to raise an estimated Â£18 million to renovate the large{Prospect Estate.} The alternative is to demolish part of the estate. ************* {Rushmoor Royals}swimming teams had some success in the Hampshire and South Coast Junior swimming cup. Vicky Page, of{Manor Junior School } won individual butterfly and was in the team who won free-style and medley relays.
*************
